title: Betrayed
description: Two 11 year old boys are best friends. Zeth gets a ransom note and Chase sneaks away in his place. Zeth's parents, Lord Sybertexius, the Dragon King and his wife, Lady Shaelynn Keeper, Xander, the warrior, and Gideon the elf set out to save Chase and find family they did not know existed. When Death comes to take those who have fallen in the battle, Odette the dragonette finds the love that she has been looking for her entire life.
author: Linda Hansen
